subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James dropped a long 3-pointer with 47.4 seconds left and added two free throws with 8.7 seconds to go as Cleveland beat the Magic, 97-93, on Tuesday night.
snippet: LeBron James dropped a long 3-pointer with 47.4 seconds left and added two free throws with 8.7 seconds to go as Cleveland beat the Magic, 97-93, on Tuesday night.
